titleStmt.title: The nurses bosome a sermon vvithin the Greene-yard in Norwich, on the Guild-day when their maior takes his oath, on Tuesday Iune 18. 1616 / preached by the parson of Southwalsham ; hereunto is added, Ivdahs penance, the sermon preached at Thetford before the Iudges in Lent, Mar. 10. 1616.
titleStmt.author: Yonger, William.

notesStmt.note: "Iudahs penance" has special t.p. with imprint: London : Printed by Iohn Beale, 1617.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
